content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Good day, James Smith. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am flexible with the rental price, but I would like to know more about your budget and how long you plan to stay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I will stay for one year. My budget is 800 Euros per month. What is your proposed rental price?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Based on the size of the apartment, I am proposing a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and am willing to consider a lower price if you can provide a longer lease term.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you lower the rental price to 850 Euros per month?

If not, I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.

I am not willing to negotiate any further.

TERMINATE.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I apologize, but I cannot lower the rental price to 850 Euros per month. However, I am willing to offer a discount of 50 Euros per month if you sign a one-year lease agreement. If you agree to this, the total rental cost for the year would be 10,500 Euros. If you are not interested in this offer, I am happy to negotiate further.
name: Heinrich Heine
